content.en: Anti-jamming algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the performance of wireless networks in the presence of jammers. These algorithms, such as ARES and online learning-based UFH algorithm, aim to optimize anti-jamming communications and defend against smart jammers. Other approaches include using robust cutting-plane algorithms, adaptive frameworks, and probabilistic spectrum sensing to address wireless network jamming and make cognitive radio networks resilient to jamming attacks. These advancements in algorithm design are crucial in enhancing the quality of wireless communication and ensuring the security and reliability of our networks.
content.da: Anti-jamming algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen af trådløse netværk i nærvær af støjsendere. Disse algoritmer, såsom ARES og den online læringsbaserede UFH algoritme, sigter mod at optimere anti-jamming kommunikation og beskytte mod intelligente støjsendere. Andre tilgange inkluderer brug af robuste cutting-plane algoritmer, adaptive rammer og probabilistisk spektrumsensing for at håndtere jamming i trådløse netværk og gøre kognitive radionetværk modstandsdygtige over for jammingangreb. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmedesign er afgørende for at forbedre kvaliteten af trådløs kommunikation og sikre vores netværks sikkerhed og pålidelighed.
